meanings.definition: The free-swimming larval form of certain trematode parasites.
meanings.sent1: The cercarians were tiny larvae swimming in the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the cercarians to understand the life cycle of the parasite.
meanings.sent3: The cercarians had a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The cercarians moved through the water like shimmering stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the cercarians under the microscope.
